column5: Last August the road was extremely rough and one of the ramps was not useable. With all the money that they collect they should be able to do routine maintenance. The Municipality of Sioux Lookout collects the money and is responsible for the landing. I wrote letters to the the Sioux Lookout Mayor and Council last August complaining about the conditions. Just wondering if it has gotten better or worse. Skinny
the landing is fine, there is now a 2nd dock. i saw the mayor sweeping up recently the dock, he also greeted people launching there boats, hey
